New Records: J.P. Crawford took a Heaney fastball off his foot in the second inning for Seattle’s 113th hit-by-pitch of the season, setting a new MLB record.
Key Match Events: Leody Taveras hit a home run to right field off reliever J.T. Chargois' slider in the seventh inning.
Marcus Semien delivered the winning run on a single sneaking down the third-base line in the ninth inning.
Wyatt Langford hit a three-run home run in the sixth inning, cutting the Mariners’ lead to 5-4.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dan Wilson commented on the team's resilience and need to bounce back after the loss.
Cal Raleigh expressed determination to face the upcoming challenge against the Astros.
